      • initializeGame

        public void initializeGame()
        waits for enough players, when enough players are found:

      • initializes the deck
      • initializes the players
      • deals the cards
      • evaluates the players hands

  • initializeDeck

    public void initializeDeck(int numOfDecks)
    sets up the number of decks and cards to be used some War games may have more than one deck if the users wish.
    Parameters:
    numOfDecks - number of decks to be initialized

  • initializePlayers

    public void initializePlayers()
    give a player a deck, a winpile, and a cardplayed

  • dealCards

    public void dealCards()
    deal the cards between however many players are currently in the game

  • gameOver

    public void gameOver(int winner)
    sends a popup box to both players informing them of the winner and reinitializes the game
    Parameters:
    winner - the player who has valiantly won the game

  • evaluateHand

    public void evaluateHand()
                  throws java.lang.Exception
    evaluates the players hands and moves cards to the appropriate decks
    Throws:
    java.lang.Exception - general exception that will print out the StackTrace
